Package com.eng.game.map

Class BackgroundTiledMap

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
com.eng.game.map.BackgroundTiledMap
public class BackgroundTiledMap
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
Loads renders and calculates collisions for a tiled map.
